example[0]: We walked along the beach, side by side.
definition[1]: if people work side by side, they work together to achieve something
example[1]: Local citizens worked side by side with emergency crews to pull their neighbors out of the rubble.
definition[2]: if different things or groups exist side by side, they exist in the same place or at the same time, even though this may seem difficult or surprising
example[2]: a visit to see how modern agriculture and wildlife can exist side by side
